text: The twelfth season of Let's Dance started on March 15, 2019 and ended on June 14, 2019. Daniel Hartwich and Victoria Swarovski returned as hosts. Joachim Llambi, Motsi Mabuse, and Jorge Gonzalez also returned as the judges. Dancing Stars 2019 were Pascal Hens & Ekaterina Leonova. ==Couples== {| class= "wikitable sortable" style="text-align: center; margin:auto; align: center" |- ! Celebrity ! Notability (known for) ! This show aired on 15 March 2019. In this first live show the couples then danced in groups and each couple got points by the judges and the viewers.
